headline.main: Borough That Refused Penny Payment to Install New Equipment
headline.print_headline: Borough That Refused Penny Payment to Install New Equipment

docs.snippet: A central Pennsylvania borough has changed a policy that barred a disgruntled handyman from protesting a $25 parking fine by paying with pennies....
docs.lead_paragraph: A central Pennsylvania borough has changed a policy that barred a disgruntled handyman from protesting a $25 parking fine by paying with pennies.

headline.main: Coveted Cup Spot Looks Likely for In-Form Lahiri
headline.print_headline: Coveted Cup Spot Looks Likely for In-Form Lahiri

docs.snippet: A strong showing by Anirban Lahiri at the PGA Championship has put the Indian golfer in a prime position to achieve one of his biggest goals for this year -- a spot on the International team at the Presidents Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: A strong showing by Anirban Lahiri at the PGA Championship has put the Indian golfer in a prime position to achieve one of his biggest goals for this year -- a spot on the International team at the Presidents Cup.

headline.main: Monk Gets Into Good Habit as Young Coaches Impress
headline.print_headline: Monk Gets Into Good Habit as Young Coaches Impress

docs.snippet: Eyebrows were raised when former defender Garry Monk inherited the manager's job at Swansea City following Michael Laudrup's sacking in 2014 but few doubt the wisdom of that decision now....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eyebrows were raised when former defender Garry Monk inherited the manager's job at Swansea City following Michael Laudrup's sacking in 2014 but few doubt the wisdom of that decision now.

headline.main: AT&T Helped U.S. NSA in Spying on Internet Traffic: N.Y. Times
headline.print_headline: AT&T Helped U.S. NSA in Spying on Internet Traffic: N.Y. Times

docs.snippet: Telecommunications powerhouse AT&T Inc has provided extensive assistance to the U.S. National Security Agency as the spy agency conducts surveillance on huge volumes of Internet traffic passing through the United States, the New York Times rep...
docs.lead_paragraph: Telecommunications powerhouse AT&T Inc has provided extensive assistance to the U.S. National Security Agency as the spy agency conducts surveillance on huge volumes of Internet traffic passing through the United States, the New York Times reported on Saturday, citing newly disclosed NSA documents.

headline.main: Ireland Edge Out Impressive Scots in World Cup Warm-Up
headline.print_headline: Ireland Edge Out Impressive Scots in World Cup Warm-Up

docs.snippet: Ireland were far from their best but came from behind three times in a thrilling second half to edge out impressive Scotland 28-22 in a World Cup warm-up on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ireland were far from their best but came from behind three times in a thrilling second half to edge out impressive Scotland 28-22 in a World Cup warm-up on Saturday.

headline.main: District Riven by Religious Favoritism Claims Gets Monitor
headline.print_headline: District Riven by Religious Favoritism Claims Gets Monitor

docs.snippet: When his fifth-grade son struggled with a question on primary colors posed by the TV show "Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader," David Curry saw just how bad things have gotten in the troubled East Ramapo school district....

headline.main: Biden Calls Chattanooga Shooter a 'Perverted Jihadist'

headline.main: Clinton hits back at Jeb Bush on Iraq,Islamic State
headline.sub: Clinton hits back at Jeb Bush on Iraq,Islamic State

docs.snippet: Democratic U.S. presidential candidate Hillary Clinton says "we have to do more" to get the Middle East region together to "take on the threat" that Islamic State poses, especially to women. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic U.S. presidential candidate Hillary Clinton says "we have to do more" to get the Middle East region together to "take on the threat" that Islamic State poses, especially to women. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
